1613090.name: GunKour
1613090.description:
GunKour has 2 main game types:

PvP: Player vs Player
You can play on Teams or FFA.
Pickup weapons found randomly on the map.
Use Guns, Parkour and your characters ability to defeat your enemies and win.

PvE: Player Vs Enemy
Survive as long as you can in the Endless PvE gamemode.
Kill bots to earn points, you can use points to buy Weapons/Ammo, Weapon Upgrades, Armor and your characters Ability.
Downed Teammates can be revived.
The Stats screen will show your best time (Easy Difficulty will not save best game stats)

8 Different Characters to play from: Each have their own ability
-Hunter
-Beam
-Ghost
-Blink
-Wrath
-Dome
-Rush
-Fisher

Instead of Traditional reloading, you can throw your weapon at your opponents, causing damage and even killing them.


During the match, you spawn with a Starter Pistol, you can pickup stronger weapons found on the map. Weapons Include:
-2 Assault Rifles
-2 SMGs
-1 Full Auto Pistol
-1 Sniper
-1 Shotgun
